name: OCED Stock Assessment
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'cd /workspaces/OCED_stock_assesment && [ -f .venv/bin/activate ] && source .venv/bin/activate || true; pgrep -f "streamlit run massive_tracker/ui_app.py" >/dev/null 2>&1 || (nohup streamlit run massive_tracker/ui_app.py --server.port 8501 --server.address 0.0.0.0 >/tmp/streamlit.log 2>&1 &); echo VENV_READY'
